", (int)n);        rio_writen(connfd, buf, n);    }int main(int argc, char **argv){    int listenfd, connfd;    socklen_t clientlen;    struct sockaddr_storage clientaddr;    char client_hostname[MAXNLINE], client_porrt[MAXNLINE];    if(argc != 2)    {        fprintf(stderr, "usage: %s <port>
", argv[0]);        return 0;        }        listenfd = open_listenfd(argv[1]);    while(1)    {        clientlen = sizeof(clientaddr);        connfd = accept(listenfd, (struct sockaddr *)&clientaddr, &clientlen);        getnameinfo((struct sockaddr *)&clientaddr, clientlen, client_hostnmae, MAXNLINE, port_name, MAXNLINE, 0);        printf("Connected to (%s %s)
", client_hostname, client_port);        echo(connfd);        close(connfd);    }}
